title: USB-C dongle that converts to a 3.5mm output - this often confuses(?) the phone into thinking a usb is plugged in, and instead of pushing audio through the usb-c, it brings up an option for USB interface on the phone and the audio will not transfer.
content: USB-C dongle that converts to a 3.5mm output - this often confuses(?) the phone into thinking a usb is plugged in, and instead of pushing audio through the usb-c, it brings up an option for USB interface on the phone and the audio will not transfer.
